Title: Wadjda
Actors: Reem Abdullah, Waad Mohammed, Abdullrahman Al Gohani, Ahd
Plot: An enterprising Saudi girl signs on for her school's Koran recitation competition as a way to raise the remaining funds she needs in order to buy the green bicycle that has captured her interest.
Country: Saudi Arabia, Netherlands, Germany, Jordan, United Arab Emirates, USA
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 22 wins & 33 nominations.
